name: Munchy Munchers
description:
EAT STUFF. GROW. USE YOUR SUPER MUNCHY POWERS.

Munchy Munchers is a game about a plant called Blubbity who likes eating all kinds of things. Well, maybe not all of them... except if you're using the powerful Super Munch move, which makes even toilet paper and canvas shoes seem tasty!

- Controls -
Aiming and Eating:
Press and hold S to aim
Release S to eat whatever is targeted

Super Munch:
When your combo multiplier is 3x,
press and hold D to aim the Super Munch
Release D to eat everything in the blue area!
